name: Terminus (itch) (elli_rllm)
description:
Welcome onboard Teminus Railways!

Feel free to leave your seat and explore the surreal train environment. And who knows maybe you will meet some interesting people on your way...

Created as a Bachelor Project at the University of applied Sciences Darmstadt Terminus Railways explores themes of liminality and coming off age. 

Trigger Warnings:
- car accident
- depression
- suicidal thinking

The Creators
Find Concept and Environment Artist Jonas Büttner on Instagram under @poly4g. 
Find Writer and Game Designer Marah Siemko on Instagram under ikarus_zero https://www.linkedin.com/in/marah-siemko-984936232/.
